name: VineControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on the home.”
”Alexa, what is the temperature of the home?”
”Alexa, make the home warmer.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Vine Control skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now interact with you Vine Thermostat devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable' button in the Alexa App to link your Vine Control account and discover devices.
Alexa, turn on the <name>.
Alexa, trun off the <name>.
Alexa, set the <name> to <number> degrees.
Alexa, increase the <name> by <number> degrees.
Alexa, decrease <name> by <number> degrees.
Alexa, what is the temperature of the <name>?
Alexa, set <name> to cool.
Alexa, set <name> to heat.
Alexa, set <name> to automatic.

If you have any questions, please visit the FAQ at https://www.vineconnected.com/main/faq.do

Support is available via https://www.vineconnected.com/main/compatibility.do
